co2-calculation: Rohstoffgewinnung und Verarbeitung nach Avraamides, Verpackung, Distribution, Feinverteilung und Handel modelliert von Salome
info-text: 3.83 kg of olives needed for 1 l of oil, carbon balance most influenced by fertilization, pruning (residues are burned) and soil management
references: 1. Avraamides & Fatta 2008, Resource consumption and emissions from olive oil production: a life cycle inventory case study in Cyprus 2. Salome Schori Masterarbeit 2011, CO2-Bilanzierung eines Restaurationsbetriebs
calculation-process-documentation: Wert noch inklusive Transport zum Handel
name: Olivenöl
comments: Modellierung Salome mit SimaPro und Ecoinvent, Cyprusabsorpton of CO2 included, economic allocation pomace = 0, no by products, irrigation included
